title: Katy Perry straps her tiny poodle Nugget on to her chest and goes sight-seeing in Washington D.C.
text:
She was in Washington D.C. to play at the Silence The Violence benefit concert on Friday evening.

And Katy made the most of her time on the East Coast by visiting a few of the city's attractions on Saturday.

Naturally, the 34-year-old hitmaker took her micro teacup poodle Nugget along for the ride in a quaint carrier across her chest.

Out and about: Katy Perry popped her micro teacup poodle Nugget into a carrier when she was spotted walking in Washington D.C. on Saturday

She wore the unique backpack over a pink and grey waterproof jacket, burgundy leggings and white sneakers.

Attempting to go incognito, the Roar songstress pulled a cap over her blonde, bob-cut, tresses and covered her eyes in dark glasses.

Her first stop was to a cafe where she picked up a coffee to go.

Checking her phone: The the 34-year-old wore the canine carrier over a grey and pink waterproof jacket that she teamed with burgundy leggings and sneakers

Caffeine run: Katy was in the city to play at the Silence The Violence benefit concert on Friday. And she made the most of her time by visiting the city's attractions, coffee in hand

Katy then checked out the Washington Monument, an obelisk on the National Mall built to commemorate George Washington, the first president of the U.S.

She had fun as she attempted to get the perspective right of her holding up the massive tower.

Meanwhile, the I Kissed a Girl singer posted a snap of herself in the fabulous floral frock she wore on Friday night.

Katy captioned it: 'Last night I was so happy to sing at Silence the Violence in DC for the @davidlynchfoundation to benefit @iamthearc.

Enjoying the ride: Little Nugget looked out of his snug carrier as Katy walked along

Site seeing: Katy and a pal spent some time playing with the perspectives at the Washington Monument, an obelisk on the National Mall built to commemorate George Washington

'As an avid meditator for almost 10 years, it’s the main tool I’ve learned to help me balance my mind, body, and soul.

She invited her 85.7 million followers to learn more about transcendental meditation by going to TM.org.

Katy also asked them 'to support teaching at-risk kids meditation to help them learn how to silence the violence, text CHANGE to 20222 to donate $25.'

Meanwhile, she and fiance Orlando Bloom, 42, are said to be planning a December wedding after the actor popped a ruby and diamond engagement ring on her finger on Valentine's Day.
